Articles.Content:
I discovered this incredible game about a month ago... and my social life imploded soon afterward. Coincidence? I think not!

Anyways, I've been lurking this forum since I started playing Kerbal and have learned oh so much from you all that it seems only proper I drop in to show my gratitude. To that end...

THANK YOU

Now I'm off to launch (and explode) more rockets!
If I were you, I'd end up exploding (and launching) more rockets!
Just remember not to kill too many kerbals, they have feelings you know, no matter how computer like they sound.

Just remember not to kill too many kerbals, they have feelings you know, no matter how computer like they sound.

I, for one, am envious for how darn brave these Kerbals are. They volunteer themselves (or forcibly pushed by other kerbals) to be a part of a bigger picture, to spread Kerbals to limits of the Universe..... or at least the Kerbol system!
